title: RPG skins (ITEM TRIVIA!!!)
body:
I have put a Trivia here for RPG skins, they are very interesting:

In-game models:
Braum Lionheart is wearing the {{item:3024}} around his waist
Gragas Caskbreaker is wearing the {{item:1011}} and a {{item:2003}}. He also has a book that resembles the {{item:3152}} 
Ryze Whitebeard is holding the Netherstride Grimoire (Black Brawlers item), {{item:3116}} and a Mana Potion. He is also wearing a hat similar to {{item:3090}} 
Varus Swiftbolt has the {{item:1038}} attached to his quiver

Splash Art:
Braum Lionheart is filling the {{item:2051}} with wine from Gragas Caskbreaker's barrel

replies.body: Isn't Ryze's weapon the Staff of Flowing Water and not a Rylai's? It doesn't look crystal-y enough..

> Isn't Ryze's weapon the Staff of Flowing Water and not a Rylai's? It doesn't look crystal-y enough..

There are two staves in his bundle.
the smaller staff in his bundle is {{item:3116}}
and the bigger one is probably {{item:3744}} or {{item:3112}} (held in a staff)
I danced as whitebeard Ryze, and i can confirm that he is in fact holding the Netherstride Gimoire
